item.title: 中国需要增加 2025 年财政赤字，削减存款准备金率
item.description: 据国家媒体报道，中国认为有必要在 2025 年提高财政赤字率，并表示将在适当的时候下调必要准备金率和利率。【原文：China sees need to increase fiscal deficit ratio in 2025 and says required reserve ratio and interest rates will be cut at an appropriate time, according to state media.】

item.title: 中国发出加大财政刺激和降息力度以促进经济增长的信号
item.description: 在确定来年政策重点的一次重要经济会议上，中国表示将采取进一步的刺激措施，包括提高 2025 年的预算赤字率。【原文：China signaled further stimulus measures including raising its budget deficit ratio in 2025 at a key economic meeting that sets policy priorities for the coming year.】

item.title: 特斯拉股价在特朗普的助推下重返历史新高
item.description: 从大选后美股反弹中获益最多的投资者莫过于埃隆-马斯克和他的特斯拉股东们。【原文：Few investors have benefited more from the post-election rally in US stocks than Elon Musk and his fellow Tesla shareholders.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚因通胀担忧第三个月延长利率暂停期
item.description: 塞尔维亚中央银行连续第三个月维持借贷成本不变，在持续的物价压力和通胀放缓速度的不确定性下，延续了暂停宽松货币政策的做法。【原文：Serbia’s central bank kept borrowing costs unchanged for a third month, extending a pause in monetary easing amid persistent price pressures and uncertainty over the pace of slowing inflation.】

item.title: ESRI 称爱尔兰房价被高估达 10
item.description: 爱尔兰经济与社会研究所（Economic and Social Research Institute）称，爱尔兰的房价被高估了 10%，有可能出现 "痛苦的修正【原文：House prices in Ireland are overvalued by as much as 10% and at risk of a “painful correction,” according to the country’s Economic and Social Research Institute】

item.title: 中性利率猜谜游戏给债券市场带来高风险
item.description: 在华尔街的债券桌上，似乎每个人都对中性利率有自己的看法。是 3.3%。不，是 4.5%。实际上是 2.4%。就这样，每周五天，整天如此。【原文：On Wall Street’s bond desks, everyone, it seems, has an opinion on the neutral rate. It’s 3.3%. No, it’s 4.5%. Actually, it’s 2.4%. And on and on, all day long, five days a week.】

item.title: 阿根廷人不再喜爱美元，这要归功于 Milei
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统在过去一年里完成了许多人认为不可能完成的任务：他让阿根廷人不再钟情于美元，至少现在是这样。【原文：President Javier Milei achieved something in the past year that many considered impossible: He made Argentines fall out of love with the dollar — for now, at least.】

item.title: 高盛认为埃及镑将在季节性流动减少后反弹
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Egypt’s pound, which breached the milestone of 50 per dollar to hit a record low this week, may rebound in early 2025 as a series of seasonal portfolio outflows taper off, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 印度通胀缓解，为新任印度央行行长提供了施展空间
item.description: 印度上个月的通胀率有所下降，这让誓言关注经济增长的新任央行行长稍感宽慰。【原文：India’s inflation cooled last month, bringing some relief to the newly-appointed central bank chief who has vowed to focus on growth.】

item.title: 德国风力发电量低导致电价大幅飙升
item.description: 由于风力发电量减少，德国电力价格在过去几天飙升至 2022 年能源危机以来的最高水平。【原文：German power prices spiked in the past couple of days, a level not seen since the energy crisis in 2022, as wind generation receded.】

item.title: 野村和摩根士丹利将推出印度外汇市场工具
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，野村控股公司和摩根士丹利将在印度推出货币做市服务，这将是该行业首次出现外国公司。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. and Morgan Stanley are set to launch currency market-making services in India, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be the first foreign presence in the industry.】

item.title: 印度内阁通过 "一国一选 "立法
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度内阁周四批准了同时举行全国选举和邦选举的立法。【原文：The Indian cabinet on Thursday cleared legislation to conduct national and state elections simultaneously, according to people familiar with the decision.】

item.title: 中国 Instagram 式小红书利润突破 10 亿美元
item.description: 小红书是一款 Instagram 风格的应用程序，在大流行期间在中国年轻人中掀起了一股热潮，该公司有望在 2024 年将利润翻一番，达到 10 亿美元以上，并有可能进行首次公开募股。【原文：Xiaohongshu, the Instagram-style app that took off among younger Chinese during the pandemic, is on track to double profits to more than $1 billion in 2024 ahead of a potential IPO.】

item.title: 俄罗斯精炼燃料出货量下降，柴油流量减少
item.description: 由于更多炼油装置结束季节性检修返回，俄罗斯石油产品出口在 11 月份反弹后，上周因柴油流量减少而略有放缓。【原文：Russia’s oil-product exports eased slightly last week on smaller diesel flows, after rebounding in November as more refining units returned from seasonal maintenance.】

item.title: Access 银行将收购 Bidvest 银行，谋求扩大业务范围
item.description: Access Bank Plc 已提出以约 28 亿兰特（1.59 亿美元）的价格收购 Bidvest Bank Holdings Ltd.，以帮助这家尼日利亚资产规模最大的贷款机构拓展南非市场。【原文：Access Bank Plc has offered to acquire Bidvest Bank Holdings Ltd. for about 2.8 billion rand ($159 million) to help Nigeria’s biggest lender by assets expand in South Africa.】

item.title: 挪威较好的商业前景降低了3月前减产的可能性
item.description: 挪威一项重要的企业景气调查预示着这个北欧国家的企业前景有所好转，从而支持了挪威央行至少等到3月份再降息的主张。【原文：A key survey of Norway’s corporate sentiment heralded a somewhat brighter outlook for the Nordic country’s businesses, buttressing the central bank’s case to wait at least until March before cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 阿联酋任命新天然气和化工投资部门董事会成员
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国任命了其计划中的国际能源投资机构的董事会成员，其中包括国家石油生产商首席执行官、资产管理公司 Blackstone Inc.【原文：The United Arab Emirates named board members for its planned international energy investment vehicle, which includes the chief executive officer of the state oil producer, the head of asset manager Blackstone Inc. and a former BP Plc CEO.】

item.title: 瑞士央行降息半点后，瑞士法郎跌至两周低点
item.description: 瑞士央行降息幅度超过预期，瑞郎随之下跌，分析人士认为，此举应能阻止瑞郎在未来几个月内升值。【原文：The Swiss franc tumbled after the central bank delivered a larger-than-expected interest-rate cut, a move that analysts say should stem the currency’s appreciation in the coming months.】

item.title: 德国取消 3.5 亿欧元氢能项目补贴
item.description: 德国放弃了向氢能项目投入 3.5 亿欧元（3.68 亿美元）的计划，这使得清洁燃料目标更加遥不可及。【原文：Germany abandoned plans to funnel €350 million ($368 million) into hydrogen projects, putting clean-fuel goals even further from reach.】

item.title: 电力公司私有化谈判在印度邦引发抗议
item.description: 印度人口最多的邦的电力行业工会正在抗议将其部分配电业务私有化的计划，认为此举将损害消费者和员工的利益。【原文：Power industry unions in India’s most populous state are protesting plans to privatize a part of its electricity distribution business, arguing that the move will undermine interests of consumers and employees.】

item.title: Vishal Mega Mart 9.44 亿美元首次公开募股第二日售罄
item.description: 在高净值投资者和散户投资者强劲需求的推动下，Vishal Mega Mart Ltd. 首次公开发行的 9.44 亿美元股票在第二天就全部售出。【原文：Vishal Mega Mart Ltd.’s $944 million initial public offering was fully sold on the second day of the sale, driven by strong demand from high-networth and retail investors.】

item.title: 国际能源署称欧佩克+推迟供应无法防止明年石油供应过剩
item.description: 国际能源机构称，尽管欧佩克+上周决定推迟增加供应，但明年全球石油市场仍将面临供应过剩。【原文：Global oil markets face a glut next year despite last week’s decision by OPEC+ to delay supply increases, the International Energy Agency said.】

item.title: 奇货可居：为什么不能一键获得抵押贷款再融资（播客）
item.description: 如今，只需点击一下按钮，您就可以做很多事情。你可以买保险、开银行账户，或者通过 ETF 同时交易 347 种不同的股票。但有一件事你绝对无法一键完成，那就是抵押贷款再融资。事实上，抵押贷款仍然需要大量的文书工作，其中很多都需要邮寄给相关各方。那么，为什么按揭融资还停留在石器时代呢？在本期节目中，我们将与我们的共同创办人迈克-于（Mike Yu）进行对话。【原文：You can do a lot of things with the click of a button nowadays. You can get insurance, open a bank account, or trade 347 different stocks all at once via an ETF. But one thing you definitely can’t do via a single click, is refinance your mortgage. In fact, securing a mortgage still requires reams of paperwork — a lot of which has to be physically mailed to all the different parties involved. So why is mortgage finance stuck in the stone age? In this episode, we speak with Mike Yu, co-founder and】

item.title: 罗马尼亚和保加利亚赢得全面进入无护照欧盟区的机会
item.description: 经过近二十年的艰苦努力，罗马尼亚和保加利亚将于明年全面进入欧盟免护照区，这将有助于提振这两个国家陷入困境的经济。【原文：Romania and Bulgaria will gain full access to the European Union’s passport-free area next year, following a grueling, nearly two-decade push that will help boost their struggling economies.】

item.title: 南非通胀预期降至三年来最低点
item.description: 南非对未来两年的通胀预期降至 2021 年以来的最低水平，更加接近央行目标区间的中点，这为决策者继续降息提供了更多理由。【原文：South African inflation expectations for the next two years fell to their lowest level since 2021, edging closer to the midpoint of the central bank’s target range and boosting the case for policymakers to continue lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 据说华宝接近达成联合信托银行少数股权交易
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，华平投资集团（Warburg Pincus）正在就收购联合信托银行（United Trust Bank）20% 的股份进行深入谈判，这将使这家英国专业贷款机构的估值达到约 5 亿英镑（约合 6.38 亿美元）。【原文：Warburg Pincus is in advanced talks to acquire a 20% stake in United Trust Bank that would value the UK specialty lender at about £500 million ($638 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士联合银行意外降息半点，遏制法郎涨势
item.description: 瑞士国家银行（Swiss National Bank）降息 50 个基点，幅度超过预期，加快了宽松政策的步伐，以阻止法郎的涨势。【原文：The Swiss National Bank delivered a bigger-than-expected 50 basis-point interest-rate cut, quickening its easing to stem gains in the franc.】

item.title: SBI 推出 300 亿日元债务计划，为创纪录的武士贷款热潮锦上添花
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的贷款机构印度国家银行正在寻求 300 亿日元（1.97 亿美元）的贷款，这使得今年除日本以外的亚洲借款人筹集的日元贷款额创下新高。【原文：State Bank of India, the country’s largest lender, is seeking a ¥30 billion ($197 million) facility, according to people familiar with the matter, adding to a record volume of yen loans raised by borrowers in Asia excluding Japan this year.】

item.title: 德国股市屡创新高 2025 年将继续上涨
item.description: 今年以来，德国最大的股市摆脱了国内经济低迷的影响，令欧洲同行望尘莫及。人们乐观地认为，随着政府支出的预期增长和中国需求的复苏，德国的热潮将在2025年继续。【原文：Germany’s biggest stocks have left European peers trailing this year as they escaped the grips of a dour domestic economy. There’s optimism the country’s hot streak can continue in 2025 amid an expected boost in government spending and the resurgence of Chinese demand.】
